messages.content:
Sir, thanks for reaching out with your requirement. We generally avoid giving advise on where exactly to invest, although from time to time, we pick out good investments. If you subscribe, you'll get access to the mapview, which will allow you to do some research on the areas and the prices. Once you fix on an area after doing your entire research, we can hand-hold you, into acquiring lands there and suggest you, on which among the available, is better. 
Also, NRIs can't register agricultural lands. You might want to look into that.
Would like to invest around Hyderabad or in the radius of 100km from Hyd where a development scope is there

Hi Sir
I have been following your channel for quite some time 
And found you share useful information. 
Myself Srinivas a NRI residing in Germany. 
I would like to become your premium member, I am also looking to invest on land for around 20L with a focus of 5-6 years for good returns. 

May i you suggest which location is good for investment which gives very good returns in long term

Looking forward to hearing from you. 

Srinivas
+49-1731727679 ( available on whatsapp also to discuss more)
